    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">CCTV as an application of electronic circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CCTV als Anwendung der elektronischen Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CCTV comme application des circuits 
électroniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">CCTV como uma aplicação de circuitos 
eletrônicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">CCTV come applicazione dei circuiti elettronici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">CCTV ως εφαρμογή των ηλεκτρονικών κυκλωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">CCTV como aplicación de circuitos electrónicos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the use of closed-circuit television (CCTV) to monitor banks and shopping mall activities.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">banks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">CCTV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">closed-circuit television</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monitoring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shopping malls</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">surveillance camera</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Monitorbänken und den 
EinkaufenMallaktivitäten den Gebrauch des Industriefernsehens 
(CCTV).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'utilisation de la 
télévision à circuit fermé (CCTV) aux banques de moniteur et aux 
activités de centre commercial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o uso da televisão de 
circuito fechado (CCTV) aos bancos do monitor e às atividades do mall
de shopping.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'uso della 
televisione di chiuso-circuit (CCTV) alla banca del video ed 
alle attività del centro commerciale di shopping.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη χρήση της κλειστού 
κυκλώματος τηλεόρασης (CCTV) για να ελέγξει τις τράπεζες και 
τις δραστηριότητες λεωφόρων αγορών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el uso de la 
televisión a circuito cerrado (CCTV) a las baterías del monitor y a 
las actividades de la alameda de compras.</string>
          </description>
